title: If you are going to use a tier list.
body:
Don't use a tier list that isn't designed for your ELO/MMR.

Had someone justify a shit pick by the fact that it was on a tier list that wasn't designed for people who don't have mechanics or knowledge.

If you have to pick off a tier list and you are low elo, please for the love of god pick the simpler champions in the tiers, and don't be playing champions you don't understand the kit of.

replies.body: I don't care about the tier lists for my own or any elo. If I have mastery 7 on a champion, and when I play them, they feel strong, then I don't want my teammates banning them because it's 'bad in silver'. I hate teammates throwing a hissyfit and forcing me to forgo my pick of zilean despite our team having 4 ad champions for my next best support janna.

Support isn't a role i worry about for this sort of thing anyway, mostly top/mid/jungle.

Honestly as long as the support isn't something super troll (Teemo level of troll) i don't really care, i'd rather the support play their best.
